ALTER TABLE DASH107036.GROUP ALTER COLUMN GROUP_ID SET GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( START WITH 81 INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE -2147483648 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 20 );CALL SYSPROC.ADMIN_CMD( 'REORG TABLE DASH107036.GROUP' );
